extendedInfo.description: NVision is the best original news app for all things Android. Our top editors write fresh new content every day that is ONLY available on NVision. We cover the hottest stories across games, apps, and technology and tell you what you should be playing and give you exclusive sneak peaks into what's coming next.NVision is the world's premier resource for discovering the best apps and games available on Android, learning about innovative technology on the horizon, watching gorgeous high-definition trailers, game play footage and much more. Available for all Android devices, the NVision app also has cool 3D tile-flipping capability on Tegra powered devices.NVISION CATEGORIES:ANDROID GAMESâ¨No one on Google Play covers video games the way NVision does. Thanks to insider perspectives and in-depth analysis of developer technology and techniques, NVision pulls back the pixel curtain to reveal the art and science behind todayâs hottest games across the ever-expanding mobile landscape.ANDROID APPSThere are more than 700,000 apps (and counting) on Google Play. We sort through them all and cover the best, most useful and easy-to-use ones, with direct links to download the ones you like.VIDEOWeâve created a section of NVision dedicated entirely to showcasing high-definition videos including original Android game play footage captured by our editors, trailers for new games on all platforms, visual demonstrations of innovative technology and more.  TOP PICKSIn NVisionâs Top Picks category, youâll find reviews on the latest Android video games and apps as well as our weekly roundups of the best new releases on Google Play.GAMESWe know that you don't just play games on your phone and tablet. Sometimes you want to sit at your desk or on your couch, kick your feet up and play some PC or console games. Well, we've got you covered with the latest stories on the biggest and best games these platforms have to offer.TECH NVision takes readers to the forefront of visual technologyâfrom bleeding-edge graphics processors to Android-powered smart TVs and in-car entertainment, NVision delivers in-depth coverage of tomorrowâs tech and gadgets today. Itâs also specifically geared towards fans of NVIDIA products like GeForce, NVIDIA Shield and TegraZone.KEEP UP ON NVISION:Visit our website at www.nvisionapp.com and be sure to follow us on Twitter at @NVision_App and on Facebook at facebook.com/TheNVisionAppIf you are experiencing technical issues or would like to reach out to our editorial team, please shoot us an email at info@dialectinc.com

reviews.title: Disappointing.
reviews.comment: The only thing that worth it are the news.  The software can only work on landscape mode, switch between articles is a pain, videos always buffer. It\'s a shame because news are great on the app.
reviews.author: Sandro Lima

reviews.title: Dislike the latest version (2.1.12)
reviews.comment: There is no portrait mode option. It\'s all landcape now and you\'d think it would be easier to read articles. Unfortunatly I have to squint my eyes to read and it\'s really annoying and tiresome. It\'s a shame, given the great articles - I used to use this app frequently.
reviews.author: Louis Magos

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: It\'s a good app for keeping up with some tech news. Only problem I have is pressing the back button to come out of a news story stops whatever song is currently in playing Google music player.
reviews.author: Matt Fryatt

reviews.title: Just WOW
reviews.comment: The title says it all this app is freaking awesome, simply the best.
reviews.author: Karl Wonder

reviews.title: The layout is mindblowing
reviews.comment: Its awesome and it looks futuristic. This is evolution of the technology, evolution of news. The new form the new avatar. Keep up the good work nVidia.
reviews.author: Bharat Thapa

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: Always read the articles and news on here
reviews.author: Ruslan Tykhanskyy

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Missing the landscape mode fornphones with big screens. Also it will be lovely if the devs provide the live wallpapers from the nvision for the android itself. Best regats!

reviews.title: Average
reviews.comment: Looks pretty, but not enough news to keep me using it for more than 5mins at the time. I\'ll stick to my news feed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really nice on my Nexus 7
reviews.comment: This app really looks nice on my new Nexus 7. The news is great to keep up with what\'s going on.
reviews.author: Chris Howard

reviews.title: Nvision
reviews.comment: I really like this app. But they haven\'t had any new articles in little less than a week. I know they have been having server problems but how long does that take?! When they get it up and running I will definitely give it 5 stars!... Its back baby 5 stars
reviews.author: adam anderson

reviews.title: Great, but needs a bit of polish
reviews.comment: Awesome job on the UI, but scrolling could be better. Ad placement isn\'t great and occasional slow loading. Please Improve!!!
reviews.author: mark john

reviews.title: Great looking but sluggish
reviews.comment: I really like the look & feel of the app, but it responds really slowly when moving between the pages and opening up articles. And this while I\'m on H+ or wifi on my Galaxy Nexus. Could be a great one, but I\'m uninstalling for now.
reviews.author: Charl Fourie

reviews.title: Not good enough yet.
reviews.comment: Stopped my music player after reading each article when returned to the main screen. Scrolling is clunky and slow. Good startup animation but totally unnecessary for sound. Good articles. Bad fonting settings which cannot be reverted in an article should the font size is enlarged.
reviews.author: Wong Jian Ann

reviews.title: Good but still lack of something
reviews.comment: While it appearance resemblance nVidia,i thought it contains only all about nvidia. turns out it contains all about android app and games also console games. Problem is loading time not fast,and sometimes failed to load but refreshing suddently showed the article. It seems a problem on backend of the app. And sharing option is look like hell. I can\'t even shared the article via whatsapp or any other messenger app. The fb sharing also open browser,not fb app and thumbnail only show the app logo in fb post.
reviews.author: nezu ko

reviews.title: Bad UI decisions
reviews.comment: Content seems great but UI is way off.  Scrolling is (feels) slow and clumsy, which is the most annoying part. I would also love if there was an actionbar for sharing, liking and etc with navigation drawer on the left for switching categories. Current design does not fit with the rest of the system and it seems unnecessarily complicated.  Plus it (especially animations) seems like a waste of device\'s battery life. Using more commonly used UI decisions would improve application performance.
reviews.author: Pijus Navickas

reviews.title: some bad things
reviews.comment: the app features gr8 news but its loading time and touch interaction r v.bad plzz fix it p.s. I hv fast internet connection
reviews.author: Ajinkya Chavan

reviews.title: Good andriod news app makes my tablet feel worth the money
reviews.comment: Love the app really good developers that want to help fix any problems.
reviews.author: Ronnie Reiff

reviews.title: Loves this app but
reviews.comment: Why haven\'t there been any new articles in like 2 days or am is there just something weird happening with my s4
